block.p: American League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Placed RHP Jason Dickson on the 15-day disabled list. Purchased the contract of RHP Brett Hinchliffe from Edmonton of the PCL. Transferred RHP Tim Belcher from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list.

National League ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Activated RHP Matt Mantei from the disabled list. Optioned RHP Vicente Padilla to Tucson of the PCL. FLORIDA MARLINS--Activated RHP Ricky Bones from the 15-day disabled list. MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Optioned RHP Ray King to Indianapolis of the International League. Activated RHP John Snyder. PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Optioned OF Emil Brown to Nashville of the PCL. Activated RHP Francisco Cordova from the 15-day disabled list. Recalled 1B Ivan Cruz from Nashville. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Recalled RHP Will Cunnane from Las Vegas of the PCL. Optioned RHP Brandon Kolb to Las Vegas.

American League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Placed RHP Jason Dickson on the 15-day disabled list. Purchased the contract of RHP Brett Hinchliffe from Edmonton of the PCL. Transferred RHP Tim Belcher from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list.

National League ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Activated RHP Matt Mantei from the disabled list. Optioned RHP Vicente Padilla to Tucson of the PCL. FLORIDA MARLINS--Activated RHP Ricky Bones from the 15-day disabled list. MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Optioned RHP Ray King to Indianapolis of the International League. Activated RHP John Snyder. PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Optioned OF Emil Brown to Nashville of the PCL. Activated RHP Francisco Cordova from the 15-day disabled list. Recalled 1B Ivan Cruz from Nashville. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Recalled RHP Will Cunnane from Las Vegas of the PCL. Optioned RHP Brandon Kolb to Las Vegas.
Pacific Coast League CALGARY CANNONS--Placed RHP Hector Almonte on the disabled list, retroactive to May 19. Announced RHP Ryan Henderson was promoted from Portland of the Eastern League.
California League SAN JOSE GIANTS--Activated OF Scott Daeley from the disabled list.
Atlantic League ATLANTIC CITY SURF--Released player-coach Gerald Young. LONG ISLAND DUCKS--Traded INF Jose Olmeda to Atlantic City for INF Brad Strauss.
NEW PALTZ--Named Heather Mackay field hockey coach and women's lacrosse coach. ST. FRANCIS, PA.--Named Jamie Bryant assistant football coach and Dr. Phil Benham NCAA faculty athletics representative.
